tool_description: Collects open source intelligence from public sources including social media, forums, news, and technical publications.

search_terms.description: Keywords and terms to search for in OSINT collection

source_types.description: Types of sources to collect from (social, news, forums, technical, academic)

collection_period.description: Time period for OSINT collection in ISO 8601 format

language_filters.description: Language codes for filtering collected content

relevance_threshold.description: Minimum relevance score for collected content (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid search terms: Search terms cannot be empty or contain invalid characters
Unsupported source type: One or more source types are not supported
Invalid collection period: Collection period must be valid ISO 8601 duration
Language filter not supported: One or more language codes are not supported
Relevance threshold out of range: Threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Source access denied: Unable to access one or more specified sources
usage: Specify search terms, source types, and collection period. Configure language filters and relevance threshold for quality control.

source_breakdown.description: Number of items collected from each source type

content_relevance.description: Relevance scores for each collected content item

collection_timestamp.description: Timestamp when OSINT collection was completed
